content:
Do we expect ImplementationGuide.contact.telecom to only contain a website, or can it be populated with any contact information?

I've added an email address (with email system), and that's causing hundreds of broken links in my build.
Aha! that is a good reason to make a profile on ImplementationGuide for our tooling.
the template makes assumptions - I think the first contact is a website
Or have our tooling look for a telecom that's a url (and current too).
The website doesn't have to be first, but the template requires that there be a website contact. If you want to have phone numbers or other types of contacts too, that should be fine.
@Lloyd McKenzie , The template apparently requires that the first contact be a website. I swapped the order and the issue resolved.
Hmm. Can you submit a Git issue against the template? It shouldn't be that sensitive...
It shouldn't. I will. :smile:
